scripts.test: node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register(pathToFileURL("./import-map-hooks.js"));' --test
scripts.watch: echo ex: 'node --watch-path ui --watch-path index.js --watch index.js --title RoboticMotionOverview --sleep true --dist ~/Uploads/robots  ~/Downloads/foo/wwwb'
scripts.save: git add .; git commit -m 'Updated Release'; npm version patch; npm publish; git push --follow-tags;
